p: Coffee is the most consumed and popular beverage in the world after water, having 155.469 thousand of 60 kg bags ( ICO, 2017) consumed worldwide in 2015/2016, and an average of $20 billion dollars of exports per year (according to the Global Coffee Industry). Consumers prefer arabica specie because it tastes better than robusta ( Mehrabi and Lashermes, 2017) so that the “specialty” and “gourmet” segments have been growing fast in coffee industry, mainly in producing countries such as Brazil, Colombia, Vietnam, Ethiopia, and Indonesia.
